Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to kindly request a document FF/FA contract. As a 

required Nakheel mall management. I would appreciate it if you could send it to me at your earliest convenience.

 

If there are any forms or procedures I need to follow to obtain this document, please let me know.

 

Thank you very much for your assistance

 

Best Regards,

Roxanne
